meta-review.comment: Rise of the Tomb Raider takes Lara Croft to new heights with an exhilarating adventure filled with clever puzzles, stunning visuals, and thrilling combat. While the mandatory combat may lack challenge on lower difficulties, the game's optional tombs and Lara's enhanced combat abilities make for a riveting experience. With seamless integration of gameplay and story, this title sets a high bar for modern action-adventure games.
